attributes.action: tax banker's bonuses at 50% from here until eternity. Not as a punishment but because this is what the rest of us in the real world have to pay.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When I receive my payslip, whether it includes commission, bonuses or any other form of incentive, I still pay tax on the entire gross amount. Why should bankers be different? I do not believe they should be punished for misdemeanours, simply to live by the same rules as the rest of us.
